title: Boy, 9, fatally shoots himself on Detroit's west side
content:
A 9-year-old boy fatally shot himself with a shotgun Monday afternoon on the city's west side, according to Detroit Police, who said he was found in an upstairs bedroom by his father.
The shooting happened at 12:33 p.m. in the 6600 block of Barton Street near Livernois, said Detroit Police Officer Nicole Kirkwood.
"He was found by his father, suffering from a gunshot wound to the head," Kirkwood said. "The child was found near a shotgun so it may be self-inflicted but we're still investigating."
Few details were released by Detroit Police, who remain on the scene investigating the shooting, according to Detroit Police Officer Jennifer Moreno.
More details were not immediately available from police.
